title: Felipe Peralta
text:
Felipe Peralta (born 2 May 1962) is a retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> from <a href="Paraguay">Paraguay</a>. He played professional football in Paraguay, and also had a spell in <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a>, playing for <a href="Deportivo%20Pereira">Deportivo Pereira</a>.
International.
Sanabria made his international debut for the <a href="Paraguay%20national%20football%20team">Paraguay national football team</a> on 14 June 1991 in a Copa Paz del Chaco match against <a href="Bolivia%20national%20football%20team">Bolivia</a> (0-1 win). He obtained a total number of five international caps, scoring no goals for the national side.
